name: Extreme Plant Sitter
description:
FULL SCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE!

NO MOUSE?  SPACE can be used as an alt control for RIGHT CLICK (i.e. using items)

_________________________________________________________________

Mom has put you in charge of her plants while she's out -- it would be a shame if you neglected them, or dare I say,  *'murdered'* them.

Do you have what it takes to be an extreme plant sitter?

Delay the inevitable. Delay your hand in plant death. Delay becoming Mom's little disappointment.

__________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS

Grab item  ----------------------->  HOLD left click

Use held WATERING CAN  ------>  HOLD right click (ALT: HOLD space bar)

Use held SPRAY BOTTLES  ------>  right click (ALT: space bar)

Open/close window  -------------->  3 x left click

*Tip:*  When using items, aim for the plant BASE/POT to collide with the items' WATER SPRAY
